SYN_3_9_4452: PROCEDURE: Rigid bronchoscopy with attempted recanalization and tube thoracostomy. INDICATION: Left mainstem stenosis. FINDINGS: Complete occlusion. ACTION: Recanalization attempted via electrocautery, dilation, and APC. A false lumen revealing the pulmonary artery was encountered. The procedure was terminated. Fibrin sealant was instilled. A chest tube was inserted for subsequent pneumothorax. DISPOSITION: ICU.
